mapper.select: with temp as ( select Main_quotation.item_code, Main_quotation.item_name, Main_quotation.form_code, Main_quotation.form_name, d.supplier_name, d.supplier_code from Main_quotation INNER JOIN Sub_quotation d ON d.relation_id = Main_quotation.ID where d.bid_state = '2' UNION all select Main_quotation.item_code, Main_quotation.item_name, Main_quotation.form_code, Main_quotation.form_name, d.supplier_name, d.supplier_code from Main_quotation INNER JOIN Sub_quotation d ON d.relation_id = Main_quotation.ID where d.bid_state = '2' ) SELECT distinct * FROM temp;

select distinct m.item_code, m.item_name, s.* from Sub_quotation s left join Main_quotation m on s.relation_id = m.id left join org_member on org_member.ID = m.proposer left join org_unit on org_member.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID = org_unit.ID where s.enable_status = '正常' and s.bid_state = 1 and org_member.NAME = #{name} order by s.stock_code, s.stock_name, s.norms asc

select distinct m.item_code, m.item_name, s.* from Sub_quotation s left join Main_quotation m on s.relation_id = m.id left join org_member on org_member.ID = m.proposer left join org_unit on org_member.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID = org_unit.ID where s.enable_status = '正常' and (s.bid_state != 5 or s.bid_state is null) and org_member.NAME = #{name} and s.id = #{id}
